header.mss: Welcome to M.C. Motors, how can we advise you today?

welcome.text: We are a company based in Eastern Europe, in Romania, passionate about German engines and other distinguished models. We specialize in the sale and export of high-end used vehicles, as well as the distribution of original automobile parts. Our mission is to offer a complete service based on principles of honesty and excellence, ensuring the satisfaction, comfort, and safety of our clients. We facilitate access to quality products and specialized advice for our clients in multiple languages, including Romanian, English, Spanish, German, Hungarian, Polish, and French.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why choose us?
WhyChooseUs.text: If you are considering starting a business in the automotive industry, we offer wholesale prices for the purchase of multiple vehicles. Our specialized team also provides personalized advice on export, customs procedures, and the market in both the European Union and Latin America. Start your automotive business with us, where quality and exceptional service come together to ensure your success.
WhyChooseUs.textImportant: Did you know that new vehicles can lose up to 30% of their value in the first year? This is one of the reasons why purchasing a high-end used vehicle can be a smart choice. In our selection of used vehicles, we guarantee to maintain the same specifications and quality you would find in a new model, but with an accessible price. This allows you to enjoy advanced technology and luxury features without paying the full price of a new vehicle.
